text: Likewise the cost of building the walls of Jerusalem and fortifying it all around, and of building walls in Judea, shall be donated from the royal revenue.”
For the Son of Man did not come to be served but to serve and to give his life as a ransom for many.” The Blind Bartimaeus.
The circumcised believers who had accompanied Peter were astounded that the gift of the holy Spirit should have been poured out on the Gentiles also,
